Proportion of workforce on Furlough Leav: Office for National Statistics - Business Impact of Coronavirus (COVID-19) Survey
Percentage travelled to work: Office for National Statistics - Opinions and Lifestyle Survey
Company incorporations: Companies House and Office for National Statistics
Company voluntary dissolution applicatio: Companies House and Office for National Statistics
Road traffic, all motor vehicles: Department for Transport - Road traffic statistics: management information

Proportion of workforce on Furlough Leav: Percentage of all responding businesses (excluding those permanently ceased trading)
Percentage travelled to work: Proportion of adults in the survey
Company incorporations: Number of incorporations, on a weekly basis
Company voluntary dissolution applicatio: Number of voluntary dissolution applications, on a weekly basis
Road traffic, all motor vehicles: Percentage point change of the weekly average, index: equivalent day in the first week of February = 100
Total ships visits: Number of daily ship visits, percentage change of the weekly average, seasonally adjusted

Indicator: decimal place (of data labels in sparkline)
